description:
Kintarou grows up to be big and strong, and fights a demon.  The Utou birds unleash a terrible curse.  Yattobei battles a Tengu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kintarou / The Curse of the Utou Bird / Yattobei and the Tengu
Kintarou / Utoudori no Tatri / Yattobee to Tengu
金太郎 / うとう鳥のたたり / やっとべえと天狗
